This romantic comedy-drama explores what went wrong in a relationship, with Joseph Gordon-Levitt's charming performance as Tom Hansen. It's a great choice if you're looking for a thought-provoking film that will make you reflect on your own relationships.

If you'd like something a bit more futuristic and action-packed, I'd also suggest "Minority Report". This sci-fi thriller is set in a world where crimes can be predicted and prevented, but it's Tom Cruise's John Anderton who finds himself framed for a murder he didn't commit. It's an intense ride with plenty of twists and turns!
